result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ
result.translation: 29. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo fala samaha aayatiin wanaagsan14 bay leeyihiin iyo rug u laabasho fiican (Janno).
result.footnotes: 14. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: Jannada waxaa ah geed uu u socdo hooskeeda kan gaadiid saaran boqol sano oo uusan goyneyn. W.w. Al-Bukhaari.
